member.name: T:RT.TagSoup.STYLELiteral
member.summary: Represents an HTML <style> tag whose contents are provided literally (not via an href).

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.STYLELiteral.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an HTML <style> tag.
member.param: Specifies the literal contents of the tag.

member.name: P:RT.TagSoup.STYLELiteral.TagName
member.summary: Returns "style".

member.name: F:RT.TagSoup.STYLELiteral.Literal
member.summary: Specifies the literal tag contents.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.STYLELiteral.ToEnumerable(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Outputs this tag and all its contents.
member.param: The HTML specification allows certain start and end tags to be omitted. Specify true to emit such tags regardless, for compatibility reasons.
member.returns: A collection of strings which, when concatenated, represent this tag and all its contents.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.STYLELiteral.enumerateAttributes
member.summary: Throws NotImplementedException.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.InternalUtil.HtmlEscape(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Escapes all necessary characters in the specified string so as to make it usable safely in an HTML or XML context.
member.param: The string to apply HTML or XML escaping to.
If true, does not escape single quotes (', U+0027).
If true, does not escape single quotes (", U+0022).
member.returns: The specified string with the necessary HTML or XML escaping applied.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.InternalUtil.IsDefined``1(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether one or more instance of the specified attribute type is applied to this member.
member.typeparam: The type of attribute to search for.
member.param: Member whose custom attributes to search.
Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.

member.name: T:RT.TagSoup.Util
member.summary: Contains extension methods for code using RT.TagSoup.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Util.Accel(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: Adds a KBD tag to a single character to indicate a keyboard shortcut in a UI.
member.param: The string or label to add the shortcut indicator to.
The shortcut key (accesskey attribute).

member.name: T:RT.TagSoup.Tag
member.summary: Abstract base class for an HTML tag.

remarks.para: The following types are supported in tag contents:

item.description: outputs that tag and its contents
enumerates all contained objects and recursively processes them individually

item.term: Func<T> (or any other delegate with no parameters)
item.description: calls the delegate and recursively processes the return value

remarks.para: Using lazy-evaluated IEnumerable<T>s and/or delegates is a convenient way to defer execution to ensure maximally responsive output.

member.name: F:RT.TagSoup.Tag._tagContents
member.summary: Remembers the contents of this tag.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.#ctor(System.Object[])
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.#ctor(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: P:RT.TagSoup.Tag.TagName
member.summary: Name of the tag.

member.name: P:RT.TagSoup.Tag.StartTag
member.summary: Whether the start tag should be printed. If the tag has attributes, it will be printed regardless.

member.name: P:RT.TagSoup.Tag.EndTag
member.summary: Whether the end tag should be printed.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.HtmlDocument(System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates a simple HTML document from the specified elements.
member.param: Title to use in the <TITLE> tag in the head.
Contents of the <BODY> tag.
member.returns: An representing the entire HTML document.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.HtmlTable(System.String,System.Object[][])
member.summary: Special method to help construct an HTML <TABLE> element without needing to manually instantiate all intermediate row and cell tags.
member.param: If set to a value other than null, causes all rows and cells within the generated table to have the specified CSS class.
Rows (arrays of cell contents).

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag._(System.Object[])
member.summary: Sets the contents of the tag. Any objects are allowed.
member.param: Contents to set to.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag._(System.Func{System.Object}[])
member.summary: Sets the contents of the tag using lazy evaluation.
member.param: Contents to set to.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag._(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Sets the contents of the tag. Any objects are allowed.
member.param: Contents to set to.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.Data(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Specifies a data attribute for this tag.
member.param: The key. For example, if you pass in name here, the attribute will be data-name="...".
The value for the data attribute.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.Add(System.Object)
member.summary: Adds stuff at the end of the contents of this tag (a string, a tag, a collection of strings or of tags).
member.param: The stuff to add.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.ToEnumerable(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Outputs this tag and all its contents.
member.param: The HTML specification allows certain start and end tags to be omitted. Specify true to emit such tags regardless, for compatibility reasons.
member.returns: A collection of strings which, when concatenated, represent this tag and all its contents.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.enumerateAttributes
member.summary: Stringifies the attributes on this tag.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.attributeValue(System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to safely stringify an attribute value.
member.param: Attribute value to stringify.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.ToString
member.summary: Converts the entire tag tree into a single string.
member.returns: The entire tag tree as a single string.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.ToString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the entire tag tree into a single string.
member.param: The HTML specification allows certain start and end tags to be omitted. Specify true to emit such tags regardless, for compatibility reasons.
member.returns: The entire tag tree as a single string.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.ToString(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts a tag tree into a single string.
member.param: The tag tree to convert.
The HTML specification allows certain start and end tags to be omitted. Specify true to emit such tags regardless, for compatibility reasons.
member.returns: The entire tag tree as a single string.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.ToRaw(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a tag tree into a raw tag which would render exactly the same as the tag tree.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.ToRaw(System.Object[])
member.summary: Converts a tag tree into a raw tag which would render exactly the same as the tag tree.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.ToEnumerable(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts a tag tree into a string that is generated bit by bit.
member.param: The tag tree to convert.
The HTML specification allows certain start and end tags to be omitted. Specify true to emit such tags regardless, for compatibility reasons.
member.returns: A collection that generates the entire tag tree as a string.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.Tag.WriteToFile(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new file and outputs this tag and all its contents to it.
member.param: The path and filename of the file to create. If the file already exists, it will be overwritten.
The HTML specification allows certain start and end tags to be omitted. Specify true to emit such tags regardless, for compatibility reasons.

member.name: T:RT.TagSoup.RawTag
member.summary: Outputs whatever content is passed to it without any escaping. Do not use unless there's absolutely no other way of doing something.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.RawTag.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: P:RT.TagSoup.RawTag.TagName
member.summary: Throws NotImplementedException.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.RawTag.ToEnumerable(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enumerates the content.
member.param: The HTML specification allows certain start and end tags to be omitted. Specify true to emit such tags regardless, for compatibility reasons.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.RawTag.ToString
member.summary: Returns the content.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.RawTag.enumerateAttributes
member.summary: Throws NotImplementedException.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.GenerateCode.Indent(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inserts spaces at the beginning of every line contained within the specified string.
member.param: String to add indentation to.
Number of spaces to add.
If true (default), all lines are indented; otherwise, all lines except the first.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.GenerateCode.Unindent(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the overall indentation of the specified string while maintaining the relative indentation of each line.
member.param: String to remove indentation from.
member.returns: A string in which every line that isnâ€™t all whitespace has had spaces removed from the beginning equal to the least amount of spaces at the beginning of any line.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.GenerateCode.fixFieldName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a C#-compatible field name into an HTML/XHTML-compatible one.

list.item: _ would be converted to the empty string, but already skips those.

member.param: Field name to convert.

member.name: M:RT.TagSoup.GenerateCode.JoinString``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Turns all elements in the enumerable to strings and joins them using the specified and the specified and for each string.
member.param: The sequence of elements to join into a string.
Optionally, a separator to insert between each element and the next.
Optionally, a string to insert in front of each element.
Optionally, a string to insert after each element.
Optionally, a separator to use between the second-to-last and the last element.
